description: What do we perceive? The world itself, unmediated? Sense data? Momentary particulars? The world via sensory qualia? The seminar will consider these questions, as addressed by early twentieth-century writers (Moore, Russell, James, R.W.Sellars) and by more recent thinkers (Dretske, Crane, Brewer, Noe).
name: PHILOSOPHY OF PSYCHOLOGY: Perception:  Organization and Unity

section.name: PHILOSOPHY OF PSYCHOLOGY: Perception:  Organization and Unity
